item.title: Netlify blog workflow
item.description: R package blogdown과 Netlify를 이용한 블로그 개설/관리 과정을 여기에 기록해 둠 How to create a blog using blogdown and Netlify Create a new repository: https://github.com/junglee0713/netlify Clone the repository, e.g. cd /Users/leej39/Dropbox/GitHub git clone git@github.com:junglee0713/netlify.git (optional) Create an R project, say /Users/leej39/Dropbox/GitHub/netlify/netlify.Rproj. Open RStudio and install necessary packages, following instruction in https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/installation.html install.packages("blogdown") blogdown::install_hugo() If you are okay with the default theme (I am), run the following blogdown::serve_site() blogdown::hugo_build() Change the configuration file /Users/leej39/Dropbox/GitHub/netlify/config.
